sentences: Falk Grieffenhagen (born 1969) is a German musician who is a member of the electronic/experimental pop band Kraftwerk.
Grieffenhagen studied sound and video engineering in DÃ¼sseldorf, and later studied saxophone, flute, clarinet and jazz piano in Cologne, finishing in 2004.
He joined Kraftwerk as the live video-operator in 2012, replacing Stefan Pfaffe.
He has worked freelance as a musician, composer, and sound engineer since 1996.
